Uses of Interface
edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query.MultiColumnQueryHits

Packages that use MultiColumnQueryHits
edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query Implements a Jackrabbit query handler using XTF and other query handling classes. 
 

Uses of MultiColumnQueryHits in edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query
 

Classes in edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query that implement MultiColumnQueryHits
 class FilterMultiColumnQueryHits
          FilterMultiColumnQueryHits implements a MultiColumnQueryHits filter that forwards each call to the underlying query hits.
 class QueryHitsAdapter
          QueryHitsAdapter implements an adapter for QueryHits and exposes them as MultiColumnQueryHits.
 

Fields in edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query declared as MultiColumnQueryHits
private  MultiColumnQueryHits FilterMultiColumnQueryHits.hits
          The underlying query hits.
 

Methods in edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query that return MultiColumnQueryHits
protected  MultiColumnQueryHits QueryResultImpl.executeQuery()
          Executes the query for this result and returns hits.
 MultiColumnQueryHits SearchIndex.executeQuery(org.apache.jackrabbit.core.SessionImpl session, AbstractQueryImpl queryImpl, XTFQuery query, org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.Name[] orderProps, boolean[] orderSpecs)
          Sorts the query results and converts them to query hits (in the form "{} {}path1 {}path2 ...").
 

Methods in edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query with parameters of type MultiColumnQueryHits
private  void QueryResultImpl.collectScoreNodes(MultiColumnQueryHits hits, java.util.List collector, long maxResults)
          Collect score nodes from hits into the collector list until the size of collector reaches maxResults or there are not more results.
 

Constructors in edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query with parameters of type MultiColumnQueryHits
FilterMultiColumnQueryHits(MultiColumnQueryHits hits)
